synopsis.text: You Shikada, a renowned sweets maker, runs a quaint rural shop selling traditional Japanese confections, hoping his son Kokonotsu will carry on the family legacy. However, Kokonotsu has his sights set on becoming a manga artist, leaving his father's dreams in limbo. Enter Hotaru Shidare, an eccentric young woman from the prestigious Shidare Company, who has come to recruit You. To persuade You to join her family's esteemed sweets enterprise, Hotaru must first convince Kokonotsu to embrace his heritage and take over the family business, introducing him to the delightful world of dagashi. Witness the unfolding of this heartwarming tale as Hotaru embarks on her mission to unite the love for sweets and family tradition.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
